date: Sun Feb 20 2022 09:52:40 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)
description: Brian Flores has been hired by the Pittsburgh Steelers as a senior defensive assistant/linebackers coach. Flores was fired by the Dolphins last month after three seasons in Miami. Flores sued the NFL, the Dolphins, Denver Broncos and New York Giants in which he alleged racism in their hiring practices. He also claimed in the lawsuit that Dolphins owner Stephen Ross wanted him to tank games and would pay $100,000 for each loss.
metaDescription: This image created by an AI is of Brian Flores who has been hired by the Pittsburgh Steelers as a senior defensive assistant/linebackers coach.

Former Miami Dolphins coach Brian Flores joins Pittsburgh Steelers ...
Former Miami Dolphins head coach Brian Flores is joining the Pittsburgh Steelers as a senior defensive assistant/linebackers coach, the team announced ...

The ex-Miami coach will get another opportunity in Pittsburgh while the lawsuit he filed remains unresolved.

The Pittsburgh Steelers hired former Miami Dolphins coach Brian Flores as senior defensive assistant/linebackers coach, the team announced Saturday.
